lines.text: The bullet... ricocheted off the book with the ritual, and hit Slick!
The bullet wasn't even headin' in that direction, kid.
What direction? The direction of the table?
The Go Wizard could've been holding the book as a shield at the time!
Yeah, paper books. Well known for their ability to deflect bullets.
Could've been enchanted with a protective spell!
Yeah? You think that book's bulletproof?
How about I take out my piece and test that theory?
Uh- ahaha, no, that's- that's fine. We can try a different idea.
